      • add

        public PointBid.Builder add(double price,
                   double demand)
        Creates a PricePoint with the supplied price and demand. Adds the point to the PricePoint array.
        Parameters:
        price - The price of the point that should be added
        demand - The demand value of the point that should be added
        Returns:
        this instance of the Builder with the array
